text: what the heck. I did smog other car from Jiffy smog on rainbow and paid $19.99.\nBut this place charged me $27; $21 for smog and 6 for VIR fee. Whatever.

Impressive! I like the seating in the back, the bar and bartenders are great, menu looked great, can't wait to try it sometime!

if i could give century link a negative 5 stars i would, in every aspect.

\'doner\'? I think not.

awesome!

Been there twice... pretty decent, better than most, friendly staff, clean restaurant, good price, spent a lot of time in that bldg. Back when it was a Native New Yorker.

What a relaxation my facial was. As being in the beauty business myself this impressive. She was very knowledgeable down to knowing what bad stuff was in my makeup causing blemishes. Loved it!

Great customer service! Ask for Juan.
My chai wasn't as tasty as other places, but was drinkable. Friend said that it is not her experience...maybe a bad make.

long drive for a touristy, drab area, with not much to do.

Simply the best food and service!
More expensive then frys. Doesn't carry boars head cold cuts. The store it self feels bleak and gloomy when you walk in. The only reason I ever go there is for the compass bank that is inside of it.

SImilar to cheesecake factory

This place looks like its getting ready to close down!!! Weird.

Looks like they are gone. :(
Ive been there 2 times and thats about 2 times too many. Not a big fan.
Yummm

I've been there in the past and enjoyed but after this past Saturday night, we wont be back. Service was horrible food was ok.

It's a nice Cafe very welcoming and good environment to do work or just watch videos and the food is good and affordable

get the chopped salad!!!!

This is a great way to get around Vegas. I do wish it was cheaper. Other than that, it was great

it's a secret. it's pizza. it's right outside the club!

great rotisserie chicken and an amazing Genaro's Tray for 2, 4 could it off it. Lot of Peruvian national dishes. Staff English is poor. Prices are OK.

Everything we ate was AWESOME!!! What a cool place! We will definitely go back !

I love that cozy place.
Tradionnal american food with some sweet live music in the background

I always take their Burger and never been disapointed

Ahhhh yummmy! *sighs dreamily*

good date! the fly over the strip is quick, but its a good way to get the blood pumping. if you can, sit in front next to the pilot! (unless you're on a date)

Im From NYC This place was definitely subpar.

Gotta go Monday nights for Human Experience. $1 beers n great poets.

Great food... Fast delivery'

Superb service. Guys were so nice and the food delicious!!! Definitely will go again!!!
Actually real Chinese food is far more delicious than those in Panda Express, those food in Panda is extremely oily. It tastes okay but remember its not real Chinese food.

overall this place gets 3 stars due to the lack of customer service but great ass Filipino food in Vegas !

Great service, so many things on the menu I would like to try. Definitely will return on my next visit to Vegas.
I feel this is still a 2.5/3 star place and it really based on their food. The food is good most of the time but the service, the service is really bad each and every time I go there!
got vanilla with caramel salted something in a waffle cup. this is a crappy review because i can't remember the ice cream names but the outcome is amazing. go!\nboard games in the back.

Service was great food was awful they just switched to infrared ovens so if you liked the old fried food to bad. Stay away from the shrimp tacos yuck!

Bad food, snotty bartender. I put up with it from hot chicks in high school, but I don't like to pay for it. The one in Chandler is way better.

Fun bartenders who made us laugh! gREaT corn on the cob, but wait staff can be slow and there is always a problem with the check.....

Scrumptious. So many flavors, so little time...
Prices were a little expensive than I'm used too. But the smell when I walked in was like dirty laundry and musty. It's in a very sketchy area and hard to find.
Oh my, I love the coffee shop! Best chai in gilbert and my has my favorite southwest chicken salad/sandwiche. SO good!

2nd time here in a week The Chencho Fries & a Double Cheese burger !!!!
Wow, very impressed with not only the service but the food is excellent! Came out hot shrimp was not over cooked, just right.

Nice staff, food was ok very salty and everything was greasy. Nice concept needs work though. Garlic parmesan fries were good. we had 5 in our group nobody was highly impressed.

Don't bother to go to this location. Their notary isn't on premise regularly and it'll be a waste of a trip. Terrible service model.

From a 1 being horrible and a 5 being awesome:

Food - 2

Very subpar Mexican food.

Possibly THEE worst Huevos Rancheros I've ever tasted.

This bar is cool and hip. Funky and fresh to see something different. The have games and a quaint atmosphere. Huge drinks and cool people. A must see.
It's a gay club. Nothing special.
It's a great place with healthy food that's actually good.. Service was good and the owner is very on hands. It's near my house so even when I'm in a rush I'll stop in to get a good smoothie..

Their main bar is currently undergoing renovations. The walls have been repainted and the barstools upgraded. More to come as renovation progresses.

Fast and friendly service! 50 alignment and they did it fast too! Chris took care of me and got me in and out!
Not too bad but right next to light rail line. Easy in and out.

The food was surprisingly fresh tasting and the service was impeccable. The prices were a little high for what you get but all in all a great experience we will be back for sure.

Really over priced. Expect to pay around 70 per person. The plates are good but not worth the price.

The best lebanese food in the city ! I have been going here for years and it is always fresh and tastes just as good as the last time.
Three words can pretty much sum up our visit, Delicious meat coma. The sides were pretty tasty too!

The happy hour here is amazing!
Nothing to this place, the food was alright, the serves was just ok and the band playing there was horrid, I don't see myself ever going back here ever!

I love the familia pizza pie!!! Must try it.

First time to this location...tucked away in a plaza on Russell...hoping this will be just as yummies as the Village Square one! \nFood review to come...

Disappointing at best. Food cold. I sent mine back and they microwaved it I think. Unremarkable in every way except the overpricing. Boo.

Delicious find in what looks like a chain.

Wow, the manager here has the absolutely the worst attitude I have ever seen, avoid this location at all costs.

Nice, big, well ventilated club which is important b/c there is fire and smoke from above.
Its not the best place I would say but for basic pasta and pizza I can deal. I like their salads & raviolli . Sometimes you crave that cheap tasty food.

The food is all pretty greasy and a little overpriced. The Mexican pizza was pretty good if you're up for a heavy, grease-laden meal.
Poor service (the waitress asked if we were eating dinner, took our drink order, then NEVER came back to take our food order) Overpriced and tasteless food. And on top of that-rude customers.
Used to work for sean and manessa who own Vivido Gelato. nice people really caring about their employees and very fair. There were so many flavors, I didnt even get to try them all myself!
Very good Italian cuisine. I had the linguine with pesto but the mussels and fries looked great. I can see why everybody likes this place.
Great food. Great service. The cubano is awesome

I love their hibachi shrimp & seaweed salad! Good & fast. I can't say anything about the sushi. The staff is attentive, but the ambiance leaves something to be desired!

This is the best las vegas buffet I have been to. Really worth the price. I liked almost everything.
First time here and definitely will come back soon!

Best coffee and croissants in town and great service. My absolute fave coffee place, I just wish it was bigger. It's really small inside.

Love this place! First time I've been here and I can't believe i didn't come here sooner. This is the place to be.
my vietnamese coffee was DELISH but my niece's strawberry was PERFECT.\n\nparking (on saturday night) was terrible so be prepared to walk a little from the surrounding neighborhood.
Great Response and attention to Detail. I'm grateful for people that care and want to be here. Great Staff. Thank You.
Could not stop laughing. Sister and I were literally in tears. Hate the tropicana. It's so dirty and way too bright. But I loved the experience of the laugh factory!
Friendly service, clean environment. Took 23 minutes for me to get a latte. Coffee was just okay...
I'm so happy this place closed down.. This was the nastiest food I ever ate.. Period.. Hands down..

A coffee shop in the basement of a church. Thank God its the only one in town, because its too quiet, too stuffy and you can't hold a decent conversation here.
This bar is the shit. I get my drink on, smoke a cigar, and they even bring a specific cigar tray. Thanks!!!
This theatre is ok with comfortable seating and is within walking distance from the house. The prices for popcorn, soda, etc are ridiculously high compared to other movie theatres.
Meh...cheap drinks but it's clear why. Mediocre food and atmosphere. I probably won't come back
Great work from these two guys . They are very professional at all times and cheap. Definitely going to call them again when needed :)
it's not worth its price!! The taste was just so so. The waiter always recommended us the expensive food but not good food!

Nice shoes, helpful staff, but pricey. Didn't find what we were looking for.
Limited menu, food not very tasty or unique.
Not pet friendly. Unless the policy haas changed, last time I checked pets were not permitted within the dining/bar area.
The duck was great and I loved the octopus as well. Unique atmosphere with fine food!

Enjoyed their bacon burger lunch special but not so special price. It was good to be expected, nothing special though. I would have liked to have more french fries portion but it was adequate.

Sushi is great Korean food is good!!! It has a great atmosphere!! All of the staff here is really friendly!!!
Very good food. Consistent with other del taco's in California and good price.

Big fan of BevMo! Great selection, awesome sales (especially the $.01 sale), and a lot of drinking accessories available. Great place to get your booze!
Happy hour til 6 every day. Cool vibe, great wine list, awesome bruchetta. Garage door walls open up to patio seating. I'm sure we'll be spending some time at the Living Room now that we've found it.
Delicious food, Awesome Customers Service,, and Delicious Food. Oh, I already said that. lol. You can go and taste it yourself. Yummy. I\'m addicted :)

Closed now
USED to be great!!! I don't know what happened. Please bring the old Eastwind back!!!!
What? I don't get it. Why the heck does this place have so many 5 star reviews? The food was bland and meh. No thanks.

A better version of cheesecake factory. I had some pizza and pasta. It was tasty.
Good food & Good Service in a quaint caf\u00e9 at a fair price. I will become a repeat customer.

All You Can Eat sushi is the best deal in town..Always hit this spot up when I go to Vegas. Sushi is always fresh and service is quick, nice, and helpful...you won't regret coming here!!!
This is a great barbershop good work and decent prices.
Doesn't get worst than this- bland Indian dinner buffet. Ok customer service. Pretty expensive for the quality of buffet- but that is probably because it is Vegas.
Soup and salad all you can eat, it's worth it, but the rest is just ok.
Heard the music from down the street so i was looking to get my groove on. Didnt expect there to be a huge pool in the middle of the club. No room to do anything really.

Such a great find! Great happy hour. Loved the ceviche and the 3 generation tacos. Plus great service too. Will be back!
I've been to the downtown Great Dane, but more to the Hilldale site. Good stuff. Really.

Meh! Our 4 rolls tasted like something you get from Harris Teeter after its been sitting out for a while.
Always a fun place to find interesting toys. They have the usual (Legos, Playmobile, etc) but many of the unusual. A real treat.
Having a bad day? Sit at the sushi bar and order a few specials. Need a bit of happiness? Yonaka can provide multiple bites of sunshine. I love this place and always will. They never cease to amaze.
We always come here to get dolled up for Vegas time! They're always very attentive an get the job done right. plenty of chairs and stations, and reasonable prices.
Best show we've seen!\nIts amazing watching everything happen at once. The music, performers, and video. If you are looking for a show, and don't know what to see...this is a Must!

my wife and I heard of this place, went there and loved it. aps were good and the pad thai was great. right near the poker room also. cool

f, there is such a thing as too much Vegas. Too much gambling, too much heat, too much walking around in a sugary drink-induced haze, listening to the hum of the casino floor....

. I ordered four roll tacos with guacamole, extra cheese and sour cream, what I got was four taco rolls with tons of lettuce and very little cheese. And a small 1 ounce side of sour cream :(

The place is great. Very quick service.Wiil defentlycome back

Great people, great skills. Fellas check it out.

If I am going to spend this much on a burger, I am going to go sit down and eat a good burger at say Gordon Beirsch or something like that.

closed!!!!!

great breakfast!!! I LOVE IT.... 

patatoes amazing... pancakes amazing!!! yum

not amazing for supper... but good for breakie.

i love these blingblingbling stuffss!! and women are so attractive and amazing! awesome show!
First time in Vegas, last time at Little Darling. Read all the other negative reviews and you have my review summed up.

Great Coffee and deserts!!!

Not coming back. Unappreciative (not saying thank you), energy just not good. There are too many other places to have to deal with the bad, again.
cheezy nightmare

Great Pizza!

nice patio

Nice..

Fantastic breakfast!!!!
Cheap and very good food and service.
Kids loved it!!!
We will come back!!

lately it's been hit or miss, but today was a hit. machaca, beans and rice for about $6, great deal. hot, tasty, and this time not stingy on the portion, really enjoyed it.

good place to eat

closed - out of business

okay.... now I am never going back. The front door people are azzzzzzzzzzzzzes
Pretty darn good. Tasted like an expensive restaurant burger but for a lot less. Cashier is friendly. Cook is fast.

It isn't there anymore.

In the daytime, great laid back vibe and good coffee.

In the evening, great laid back vibe, good coffee, and live local bands or open-mic nights.

If only it weren't in a strip mall.

Good food\u3002\u597d\u5473

Big hotel - big lions - kind of like the way I thought Vegas would be with all the restaurants and shows located on-site that you could hope for. Saw Ka here.

This bad boy is C L O S E D!

My nephews wedding was awesome beautiful place

good food!!!

just wanted a quick bite to eat really nothing today just got the xxl nachos and freeze -- I think I got food poising not feeling good will call in am and report

always a lot of fun to see all the wealthy & glamorous people shopping. a little out of my budget but we love the fish aquarium, the king neptune show and all the beautiful people.

Love, love, love those steak sandwiches---and pizza.
Gets better and better. I havent had anything that wasn't excellent. Teriyaki Boy kicks ass. A full healthy meal at a reasonable price.
Fun atmosphere, Great customer service and food is wonderful! I recomment for anyone. They do offers on groupon so watch for that and utilize.
Fun atmosphere. Good food. Great drinks. Make sure to check out the menu before since it wasn't huge. Definitely recommended.
Beware.

Not good. Threw away everything I bought. Blech. :-(
My order is wrong 80% of the time. I think I will frequent the other coffee shops instead.

Big disappointment. Was seated in a broken down area of the buffet section by hostess. Ceiling was peeling. Quality of food was not as expected. Very poor. Not worth it. No bang for your buck.

Today was our first time here and OMG it was so good!!! Our server was Ethan and he was so nice and attentive to whatever we need. I'm coming back to this place! I love it!
AMAZING! The staff was so friendly, welcoming and the food was superb! The sangria is a must try and their vegetarian dishes are amazing!

Horrible service. I called 30 minutes prior to closing and they refused to deliver to me, 2.7 miles away from them.
Fantastic food, service and location. What else could you want?

Disgusting ass mexican't Burger king! uuhgg so gross!

terrible customer service no manager available when it takes 25 minutes to make a pretzel and a previous visit they shut yogurt machine down 2 hours before closing

Good breakfast spot

Best salon ever. 
Truly kind and know their stuff.
My hair color is gorgeous!!!
Awesome prices!
And the MEN and BOYS haircuts are $5!
Love this place

probably one of the worst pedis. she cut my big toe nail too short. it bled a little

Such a fun inexpensive experience! I loved it and had such a wonderful animated host!
Once again delish! The breakfast burrito with a fruit side...perfect for late lunch!\nLove love love you guys!
It is my favorite place to be. I love it. The interior design is magnificent. I love the indoor boat ride!. love everything about it. im in love with venetian.
Yum! Ahi Poke Salad and Tuna Tataki Roll!

Timely and professional service. We will use them again.
good hotel. reasonable prices, good food options. Love the pool.

fresh ingredients and tasty Burrito.

Great food. Nice size portions. The employees are very nice. I highly recommend this place.

place is very clean don't have to wait long workers at front desk are very friendly doctors are very nice best Dr office I have ever been to

the place is closed. the guys at the sushi place next door said it closed about 10 days ago.

I am so sad this place is closed.....What a shame.

Awesome !! My new favorite place !! Best salads in town and the owner was great !! Will be back this week !!

Friendly, Fast and reasonable. Very nice family owned business.

We went to Manzetti's tonight and had a great time. The food was great and very affordable. The steak was one of the best I have had.
Easy to get to from Russell road. The staff is friendly and the place is clean. Price is always competitive!
Great beers. The peanut stew is out of this world!
the sub was good the guy behind the counter not so good. a bit rude honestly.clean place. good music playing
So Far best BBQ in AZ. Family finished everything. It was really good. Had the baby back and the brisket. Kids loved it will definitely be back.
Great place for social networking.. Clean very spacious and staff was awesome.. Xoxo pepper!!
closed...
Amazing burgers, good atmosphere, super super friendly staff, large drinks. It's a recipe for a good night. try the brownie!!
Again, still very good, but they never took my lighting suggestions on board!! what's up with that?!\n\nthe food still is amazing though, you cant deny that
Everything we ate in this restaurant was excellent. Even when there were long lines, they got people seated very quickly.
Had a catered lunch here. It was ok. View was great. I'd go back for the free food but not if I had to pay for it.
Clogged sink in the bathroom, bleach-stained carpet, hideous curtains. Don't try heat/air conditioner unit. On stay here to sleep, but to avoid it. Only plus, Cheap during major holiday weekends.
Amazing food and service! Friendly staff!
Pizza Natali's pizza and wings are pretty good especially with their yelp deal $20 for $40 worth.
The burgers are not close to what i would describe as good. The meat was overcooked and it was a round ball of meat, which made it fall apart. \nThe fries where okay and the beer selection was good.
great gyros and friendly employees!
Love this place !! Really good ranch and wings. their 6inch pizza is perfect for one. Great tasting. Good clean place to eat and the service is good
The woman there was super sweet. However it was hot in there and my nail polish chipped the next day :(
Always great atmosphere. Service is quick and friendly. Extra large portions on everything.
If you are looking for it, it is called Dino Mart. I don't know if it's pronounced [deeno] like Dean Martin Dino, or [dyno] like the dinosaur. Much busier location so maybe that's more safer.
Comfy chairs, clean water, very chill
Great place....... EXCEPT........only Bud products. They really need to get Old Style & Miller products too.
Owner was cool. They had a humidor. Good stuff! Fine cigars! Late night tip. Great spot found on my yelp app.
Great office, great stall, great Doctor, Jack L. Hostetler, O.D.\nYou won't be disappointed.
I consider myself a burger sommelier lol and I must say that this burger is hands down the best burger in Pittsburgh.
Best Hawaiian food I've tested Near where I love.\n\nLove this place, Combo plate is my favorite!

AMAZING STAFF!!

AMAZING STORE!!

AMAZING CLOTHES!!

Cute photobooth!

My whole world was on mute as soon as i walked into TOP SHOP! Love you guys!!
Excellent breakfast with a great view of the pools but the bloody Mary's are a little on the skimpy side.
Best steak I have ever had. Place is awesome and the service is second to none. I will coming here a lot more. I have told all my friends about it and will continue to tell all
135 pounds of elk processed wrapped and frozen. $75 not bad

Mediocre food probably a decent bar.
gay Denny's gets 4 stars just for atmosphere, but as katie S. points out, the service is always atrocious. I'm sure staff is primarily prioritized by demographic, so service skill is secondary.
awesome portions of beef, i ordered the french dip and literally was sick of Arby's, this place rocks, i'll have to try the Chicago style dog next!

Always raising prices on us as well as the worst customer service over the phone... fighting with us about how they have the best everything and really they don't we are no longer customers with them!
I give it a 1 generously. The service was good. The food was stale, cold and lots of things were unlabeled or missing. Price was good but so what?
silly and stupid, but fun!!
Fuck this place, I waited in line for 2hrs and they cut me off zero s stars as far um concerned . Horrible costomer service. Don't go their.

Not worth the price, much better courses around for the money!
Hands down the best show on the strip. I've seen the other cirque due soleil shows and this one is the grandest.

overall the food was pretty good! be sure to ask for salsa and guac in the burrito, unlike chipotle they dont put inside. the horchata is great!

Great menu, fast, and delicious! Perfect for wanting something quick and cheap! Will definitely return!
I'm sorry but this pizza is not worth $15....plain and simple. Go spend your money somewhere else.

Not worth it. Expensive and quality of food isn't up to par. Left unsatisfied. Will not come back.
Bad ass cocktail lounge! With legit classic cocktails! Great food & great drinks! Try the le peche! My fav! Fell in love:) \nBeautiful room beautiful people! Got to check it out.

Eeew. Just eeew! If you want some kind of soup and salad buffet, check out Sweet Tomatoes just across the street.
Got food poisoning from here. Not a cool way to hang in vegas. One other person in my group got sick as well and we ate different things.
Went here cause a friend said was so great. After waiting over an hour to be saeted it wasn't worth the wait. It was just OK.
Fast and professional good job
Coconut Mango Wings are great! I was traveling for work so I couldn't try a mojito but they looked like the real deal!!!!
I haven't been here in over a year and this place still rocks. 5 star, still the best Gyro's in town.
not the best Dim Sum i ever had, if you have enough points at Gold Coast it might be worth it.
Love this on a hot day.
Rooms were clean and comfortable. No flat screen. Older furniture. Casino was clean w friendly staff. Not bad for price and location.
Their meat is good and nicely marinated just wish they had more variety of panchan. It's decent for Vegas... I guess. *dreaming about k-town....
It's been a month since my haircut and it still looks awesome! Jenni did a great job!

Came in with a friend from CA, he also agreed great food. Also football game was playing so we got a few good deals on good specials and drinks. Nice staff, on point with service!
Great authentic food!
Great food! \nIf you like a little taste of New Orleans in Las Vegas you must go!
Favorite restaurant! The roasted buttermilk chicken and the chopped salad are amazing!
Really, not that good. One step above taco bell, I think it's actually a mexican McDonalds?

Typical Herbst. Dirty and poorly stocked, but needed some gasoline....

I love this salon and the service too! Jane does an amazing job and goes above and beyond to make you happy
Miserable staff that works there. No thank yous for shopping at the store. Will never be back.

While I do agree with previous posts that some of the staff is a tad rude, I like the environment and the music most of the time.
Rude security but great beer.

Nice restaurant and vibe. Had better burger with fried egg else where.

Nothing urgent about it - only go if there's no other options.

Townie Chic. 

Weird on Saturday but likely better other nights.

Best served with a few drinks.
good cupcakes, had better but still would have again.
Friday Fish Fry!
As a creater of homelessness I realize the human cost. This location has good books.

The best wings ever, just wish you couldn't smoke on the patio.

First time visitor and I highly recommend! The staff and hair stylist were very welcoming and nice! I only had to have extensions taken out this visit but will definitely return once back in town. A++

The Best Burger I have ever had!! And the parmesan truffle fries, OMG....so YUMMY!!!!
im new to tanning but the girls at the front desk are sweet and very helpful! no wait, quick and easy.

had a blast sunday night. table service was great. awesome music.

The best dance crew ever, these guys bring it and rock it like no other!!
I've been sitting in the ER waiting room for 3 hours with my 85 year old grandmother who is having chest pains. Unacceptable!

Mediocre food at best and overpriced.

Best Chinese food in Gilbert BY FAR! Thank you j&k for the great and food! Love dine-in and take out! So exited we found this place!

Worth a stop in just to check it out!
While this is a new arena thus things still look fresh and sparkly, this arena has it all! Have been here twice and always come away impressed with the venue!

Love it that they have a lot of high end stores here.
the service here was great but it is slightly declining with every visit, (losing that newcar smell) I believe I will probably go out of my way to travel 15 mi back to my regular joint.

yum.yum yum \n\nBIG portions i love the gangster atmosphere....

Very friendly staff. The manager was really nice. She fixed my drink that another location Destroyed.

Ehh, it was alright. Much better choices closer to the strip.

I was pleasantly surprised by how great the food was, and their service its always impeccable!!!!! And definitely going back!

This is a great neighborhood restaurant.

Skip it. Unfriendly staff and food that is sub par. At least at the fast food spots you know what you're getting... They put cilantro on both our dishes too; on the fries and the chicken wings.

Its nice to have firefly on my side of town. As I stated on my last review I wish they updated the menu making it exciting to see a few new options every once in a while.

Great the first time we went and horrible the 2nd time

Please ignore this review until I can remove it.

I'll definitely be back!

im pretty sure i ate here...i ordered the chicken fingers with fries...plain and simple...

Cool place, modern. Good food. Fast service. I would recommend making reservation to make sure you get a table. Try general's chicken wings and shrimp & grits. Yummy!!!
What a dump. (Compared to all other hotel / casinos). Don't let the pics fool you. The old 70's casino tables and the mold in the bathrooms was enough for me. Time for an extreme makeover..
Family special, prime. The meat is amazing, even the cow tongue, which I'm normally not a fan of.
Has some good drinks and snacks. Imagine will be pretty cool for Koreans to buy some delicate and hometown food.
Seriously awesome. The burgers are wood fired and have many different styles. Great place for a quick lunch but also a good place to watch a game and down some burgers & beers
Old packer is now chiefs tavern. Cleaned up remodeled.great food and beer! Very clean.
I do photo shoots with brides all over Las Vegas, but the Neon Museum is still my all time favorite place to shoot. Epic!
As my husband so accurately put it while we shared a drink on the crappy patio, \'I've seen better ambience in a Chuck E. Cheese.\'
So far in Phoenix area this is The place for Indian (south). Never been to one place so many time specially Indian . This place is worth every $.
Bland burrito (even with salsa, cilantro, onions, everything) couldn't finish it. And the chips were way over seasoned. Queso with the chips was the most edible thing but I wouldn't order it again.
Erika is the greatest bartender in the history of TGI Fridays. That's all you need to know.
Great place for lunch. I've only had the General Tso's chicken and it is consistently good. Minor complaint....the music.
Lobster dip was great, burger were good , but no s'mores brownies all out.. Will be back again.
THE PLACE for Bloody Marys in Charlotte. You can literally get anything thrown in. I got mine all the way. Incredible, nuff said. Go NOW!
Great local gaming bar. Friendly bartenders. I would recommend better signage on the back entrance to the gaming bar and two more TVs behind the bar. Otherwise a gray place to watch a game.
Just got my hair cut by Traci today. She was very nice and attentive, and really listened to what I wanted. She did a very good job for a very reasonable price.
I met a friend for lunch today here for the first time. What an awesome lunch! The chicken pot pie is DELICIOUS!! Homemade everything!!
Roach spotted in ladies room closest to the Big Seafood Buffet. YUK!
I grew up on the Texas border and decided to give a Taco place in Charlotte a shot. Had the carne asada tacos on corn and they were great. Slightly greasy corn tort is just right! Good service too.
This place sucks!!! Cheap stores, and full of families with strollers. It's like a low end Caesars. Won't be back!
Definitely need more staff at front desk, only two people with like 50 people in line. Otherwise great stay: nice room, great service , nice view!
This CVS is pretty large and offers a wide variety of merchandise. The employees are friendly and helpful.
Terrible service. Dry wings. Sent them back no silverware. We were only table. Pizza bland and undercooked. Great TVs and the beer is cold but beer order was mixed up twice
No. The frozen yogurt tasted like freezer burn. A girl working behind the counter had a cigarette (not lit) in her mouth and was texting. Gross. Go to Mojo
The very best PASTA. I take Marc's pasta home and prepare it there. It has good texture, great flavor and of course only takes a moment to cook. My only place to buy fresh pasta.
The food needs improvement ! its not really good and I'd rather eat at DT's
Kelly is awesome! She took the time to hear about what I wanted and did a precise job. Love it. Thank you Kelly

I was surprised with the way the flowers i ordered were arranged! It was nicely done! The lady who owns this place seems really sweet too. I will definitely come back to order flowers from here again!
Sausage breakfast burrito and green salsa are awesome.
Yummy! I have had the filet and buttermilk chicken, both were delicious. Restaurant is small, but the a/c is ice cold.
It's a great bank - but not for a mortgage.
Great experience! Had a mani and pedi and they were so attentive of me. Whenever they did take a while to get back to me they apologized and continued their job. I will definitely be going back.
Tropical Smoothie is Tropical Smoothies. It's always hit or miss, always depends on who's making your drink and preparing your food. I give it an extra star only because its dine-in is open 24 hours.
The food was creative yet lacked the fusion to make it wow!\nThe atmosphere needs \'something\'
the seating is weird. its a small room and they blow a lot of smoke. I felt like a total perv sitting there with my boyfriend. I dont know why the Rio is promoting this as heavy as they are.
Bad Food. Bad Bad Food.
Always awesome
Waited 15 minutes for someone to even come and greet us and take our drink order. Never a good experience here

This is Cheesecake Factory's better sister concept. The food is great, the portions large, and staff is very talented.
Bellagio!! We've stayed at a few nice ones in Vegas and Bellagio has been the best overall. its in the middle of everything & its so pretty
Turned me on to Sweet Potato Fries!! SOOOO good

Really confusing airport. We were just picking up a buddy adn... well... it was really confusing.

LAX seems more organized than this place.

That's not good.

EW. 

Wack. 

Price conscious crowd = unsanitary public restrooms in the casino, less than helpful & friendly staff, disappointing rooms, & killer wait time for check in.

Very bad service!!they charge you 15%tip even you're only one people,no respect,never go back this shit place again!
Service was crap, manager guy was kind of an asshole, food was expensive and quality was low.
The food wasn't too bad, but it wasn't anything astounding either- particularly for the price you pay. I'd give it four stars if the prices were cheaper. \nCornbread is pretty great though!
Was supposed to see a show here - Beachers Madhouse. It was cancelled. No one here will refund us.
Average hotel bar. Stopped by with a couple friends on the way back to the hotel.
Yeah this is my favorite place in charlotte for shoes
Service sucks and food not that great I eat one roll and that's all it took for me to leave right away.
OK, Starbucks is Starbucks and this location like most has its share of regulars and comfortable atmosphere.
Oh how i miss this place. food is always awesome and they finally have pretzel bread.
Bon et pas cher! Excellent pour aller manger entre amis(es) au d\u00eener o\u00f9 tard le soir.
I loved the pollo and carnitas tacos!
Obnoxious bouncer. Irrelevant music. Good for a quick beer on a dead night. Staff just walks around to entertain themselves. There are better choices.
Best pizza and wings on town. Absolutely love this place. The wings are not your tiny ordinary wings. You will not be disappointed!
One of my all time favorite restaurants. Bruschetta is amazing!
Everything from the food to the service and the cleanliness of the restaurant was exceptional! Exceeded our expectations!
This place is a great addition to the Rivergate Community! Love it! They even have craft beer! Love the country music too.....
Fast service, friendly staff, and out door seating. The parking sucks and the outside seating is a little small (and right on the road) but overall good Starbucks!
Not impressed! Boring! I wanna support the owner but I was really let down and bored! Have not considered trying again cause I was so bored!
Exciting news! Now AZ 88 is open for lunch! Their salads are amazing whether you get the Cobb or any of their other salads.
Rude receptionist that refused to help me and told me to go online and make the reservation there. Won't be using their facilities.
I came here three days in a row because the ayce sushi and tapas was fantastic. Best thing on the menu was the garlic tuna.
Had dinner last night there and as always it was fantastic! The employees were courteous and friendly, especially Rosie who was our waitress. We love going there and the food is always the best.
The food is ridiculously poor, except for the chicken wings which I could eat pound after pound. A good place for afterwork drinkage though.
Our room needs serious renovation. The wallpaper were peeling off, the TV screen was not clear, looks like an analog. We did not get the deluxe room that we reserved. The location however is ideal.
Service was poor. When I arrived the hostess looked at me like a had 2 horns sticking out of my head. Waiter was missing for 20 minutes. Food was great
Love their shaved ice. And they deliver to my house! Just wish they had larger portions...(for the price)
Consistently great each time I come for a pedi or shellac. I've had someone different each time with good massage, clean polish and with decent English.

Beer cocktails are great. Try theElectric lemonade, honey brew and angry fireball
THE WORST SERVICE EVER!!! NOT like other C.A.S your better off @ the one's Downtown where at least there they know how treat their customers.
Coming from LA its really hard to find amazing mexican food. I beileve I found it ....the food tastes authentic and the hospitality is great.. Can't wait to try the next thing on the menu.

Original, Extra Horseradish sauce, Worcestershire Steak Sauce amazing!\n\nBest sandwiches in Vegas!
We love Bombay on Green St! Really delicious Indian food, can't go wrong!
Terrible food & service. Emailed the company to express my disappointment & never heard back from them.
Wasn't able to try the food\nAfter waiting for 15 min for service, we left!
The owner is awesome, the employees rock, the goods are great, and that's just the inside!
Phone order. Was supposed to deliver at our hotel. Was late an hour!!. No communication... Couldn't even get a hold of them. Rude/horrible customer service.
Food was average at best for a restaurant of this acclaim. Wine tower is impressive. Service subpar.
Over priced and under portioned!!!! and it all crap!!!

I was expecting more meat on my pho ut it ends up can't fill me at all.
Raw bloody chicken. 1 star for the atmosphere.
Food was very average. I ordered the wahoo and think it was undercooked. Probably will not go there again.

This office was SO friendly and nice! And I love the fit of my new contacts. I would definitely recommend.
Had the tasting menu 1. Very good. The short ribs were a little dry and the beef and mushrooms a little salty. But overall delicious meal.
small aquarium, but it's not too pricey. it has a cool tunnel where you can see the teeth of the shark. pretty cool to be able to see a shark in the middle of the desert!
Average sushi. Very friendly staff.

Pricey and not very good food. The Budweiser vendor showed up and gave out free beer which was nice but I will not be going back.

Horrible food

I come to Las Vegas frequently for work and always try to pick new places. After my meal this evening I will always stop here! Stephano please come to Arizona!
A lot of fun...just don't pay full price...go to the discount ticket office!
Delicious food, good service, and nice decor/ambiance. Smiling Banana Leaf would definitely be my second choice for Thai food in the Burgh.
EEk! Methinks not is right! The food here was terrible. It's pretty bad when you walk into a buffet hungry and leave still feeling hungry.

Younger crowd mixed with some older people. Happy hour specials are good. Didn't really like the Pierogies that much. Staff is pretty nice. Noise volume of bar is above average, but still comfortable.
Avoid at all costs. Request Linda if you feel like being belittled while you eat your reheated processed food stuffs. Terrible: more than just a name.

Great bar!!\n\nBest cheese curds in the state!!! I'm a fried cheese curd connoisseur and I'm calling it like I see it.

It's fun. The food is really heavy and it serves an empty stomach just right. It's KUNTRY all the way. Kuntry krunk. I feel like such a yuppie/cappucino cowboy eating in here, but you always enjoy it!
We ate here because we were staying at Caesars. The waitress suggested the eggs benedict, which was excellent, coffee was delicious. The rest. Was very busy, service was good. I'd go back.

The location and decor are downscale, but the food is delicious, inexpensive, and healthy.

Plenty of vegan options.

There is no alcohol served, but the spiced tea was very good.
Food was good. Service was good. Nothing impressive but not bad. A lot of choices on the menu.

Soggy crust one side burnt crust on the other. Bad flavor.

Solid service. our Home Warranty has had these guys come out twice now for 2 seperate issues. Both times they were prompt and friendly and fixed the issue.\n\nNo complaints.
Very cool place to walk around and absorb the atmosphere. I like the the little touches of literature and art that help create a pleasant atmosphere.
Love the smoothies an Immunity drink

better than expected healthy delicious food, awesome salads, call it in though cuz this place gets packed around the hot times.

OMG!

SOOOOOOOOOOOOOO CHEAP!

Aghhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh, I want to come here everyday!

Average Italian menu items and good service in a nice setting. Try the steaks they are very good for the price. Staff is also very good with children.
Bland and small is not how I ever want to describe mexican food ever again. \nSadly this is why we will be walking past mazama in the future.
Just go. It's nice and they have really great exhibitions.
Lives up to the Hype. Galbi (Grilled Beef) was more Korean than Japanese, but was some of the best I've had.

Healthy portions. Overall taste... decent. I expected more because this place came highly recommended from a friend.

I guess this is supposed to be efficient and convenient, but I wish it was a bit closer to the airport. It is nice to have one bus instead of a different bus for each rental car company.
Rena McDonald is THE best lawyer in town bar none. She is incredibly knowledgeable about all areas of the law. If you ever need a lawyer - look no further - go to McDonald Law Group.

good price, good food, good service, what more can you ask for. one of my favorite places. they always make you feel so welcome!

I don't like the food.\nA tattooed girl works here, though.\nAnd they're impressive.
They have the most amazing chicken tikkas. It is really authentic . Love this place

It's a Starbucks like every other Starbucks, nothing to see here move along. Although Starbucks in Paris sells mini dollar sized pancakes and man could I go for one of those.

Absolutely love Tease it Up. Tara is THE best!! Great quality work at fair prices in a relaxed atmosphere.

Very good, yet not to memorable

Beautiful place to eat
Best Canneloni I have ever eaten. It's so good it can get you past the garish decorating.

This is a D*Bag hot spot!! If you're a D*Bag or the Hot Chicks who bafflingly flock to the, you will LOVE this place!!\n\nWorkers, mind the elevator security.
Very good food and wine list!! Service was a little on the slow side but still very good! The charred corn was a little too smoky / lamb was great / overall very very good!
Food tasty for a fast food.
Super disappointed with the seating. If your going to offer movies in the crappy theater rooms. Have more show times

Just happened to be driving by and thought is stop for lunch. Got the Kung Pao chicken and asked them for extra spicy. Amazing!!!! So good and my mouth is on fire!!! Will definitely be coming back.

Awful service the hostess was very rude and the prices are ridiculous for the quality of food. I would rather go to Streets of New York or Buffalo Wild wings.

Delicious!! The tuna tacos were yum and had a great kick to them. Loved the whole meal.
Our wedding was amazing!! Chris really put this together and was able to read the crowd and play songs I did not even think of. A+++ very reasonable priced. Would use him all over again.

good burger great zucchini!

- misleading prices displayed outside

- slow service.
- below average food.
One of my faves! The short ribs with the egg on top...sublime.\nthe fish tacos-the best. I love the atmosphere and the server's are great.

A great place! Fast, friendly service and the bike I rented was well tuned. They also provided a couple of good routes for riding.
We love Sam. He is funny and kind and makes you feel at ease. His office staff is just as friendly. Highly Recommended
Been going here for YEARS!!!!!!!!! Nice to see it busy!
Fun. Sexy. Wild. Expensive. Best time I've had in vegas in a loooong time!! :)
Excellent food. Any of their curries is delicious. I specially enjoy their lamb curry.

They're staying late so my hubby can pick up some juice for me!!! They are the BEST!!! \n\nInfinite flavors!!! Oh, yeah!
Kristi is a real joy... I love getting 0% service and be completely ignored when trying to order a drink. Unless I am one of her ass-kissing regulars. And it's happened countless times.

Food is good, alot to choose from. Servings are really big. The place was on tv so it's usually crowded. Close to my house.

Good service, very mediocre steak, sides and dessert.
Yummy bruschetta, great entertainment, welcoming staff and good service
Cher pour des hamburgers, mais que c'est bon! M. Personnalit\u00e9 \u00e9tait novateur
This is the best Mexican food in York County. Best queso dip I have ever had. Great flavors and service. I go at least once a week. I love how it's right across from Neighborhood.
My wife had the turkey sandwich and it was way too dry. My Dad had the turkey cranberry and there were bones in it. I had the meatball and it was actually pretty good.
All the food and appirizers we ordered were good especially the grilled cheese sandwich. Great place to sit outside to eat in nice weather. Wish they had a happy hour.
Food is good, service at the bar is great.
Can never go wrong. Parking is kinda hard sometimes. No big issues. It's close so we stop by often.
So good! A salad and a slice. Delicious. Great service, too!
At least theyre customer service is better than the other location the new food items not the best! pretzels were good but everything else just so-so at best

Love. Love. Love this place everytime I am in AZ it is a must. Great food and service. The wings and pizza are amAZing...from thin crust to deep dish. Go early.
Worst service. The cashier was trying to make the mcflurry and knew it was running out of mix. Instead of just telling me we are low on mix she gave me half a cup! Never again.
Lowes will always be the copy cat box hardware store in my book. I just have a much better experience with the service and selection at home depot.
I have ordered from Napoli several times, and have been highly satisfied with food and service. Friendly stuff, and great food. Our favorites are calamari, pizza and wings..
Great Italian food. The chef is very friendly.
The Breakfast buffet was descent. It had everything you would expect or need for breakfast. I did not take advantage of the guy making omlettes but they looked good.
This contains more talking and more dancing than all the other Cirque du Soleil shows. Unless your a huge Elvis fan go see Ka or O. Both are better.
use multiply times for different projects with different price range, never had any issue with time, or work quality, they will do $100 job same what as $1000
Weirdest veggie burger ever, also frozen fries for $5 yuck! To top it off $7 for a Bass that's more expensive than Boston!! \n\nSkip this place!
It's been enjoyable one of the nicest hotels on Boulder Hwy not worth the price though!
I totally love My Popcorn Kitchen. I have tried about ten of the flavors. Every flavor has been amazing! I will be stopping by for a mini bag of beer cheddar before movie night!
STAY AWAY FROM THIS PLACE. They have nurses on drugs walking around in a zombi like state. nurses that have been in drug rehab several times an handing out patient meds. ......This place is run bad.
Great location and the staff is super helpful and friendly!! Had a list and they took it in stride. Great job.
Yummmyyyyyyyyy truffles!
Hannah is the most amazing waitress in the joint. I highly recommend you sit in her section!
Food was great as usual! Need to go once every season to try the menu. Excellent portions and combinations. Love the healthy choices and the atmosphere.
This is cool place to eat. Great atmosphere and good food. Good people. Food has been great every time I go.
Friendly staff. The owner is always there, with a smile. My food is always good, and not overly priced. \n\nNote to manager, great job on trying to speak spanish, maybe work on your accent?!
Just doesn't taste good like Pizza Hut used to. Thank god a couple other pizza places opened up that deliver.
Just very average pho, with crappy service during lunchtime, mainly because there are lots of people during that time.\n\nI would probably hire more waiters if I were the owner...
Amazing food, crappy service. slow, unattentive and almost rude. Go for the food.

Got a groupon for my daughter for full color and cut.
We saw Lauren, she was very friendly & did a great job. 
My daughters hair looks absolutely beautiful. 
Would definitely recommend.
Last time I was here everyone was so attentive but now this bartender is rude! Thanks for my beer, it tastes like it should.
so this is where the sexy ladys stay...
Maybe I went on an off day.\n\nThis buffet reminded me of Hometown Buffet. Sad, worn out, and full of subpar food.
$34 for a 15 minute pedicure was a little on the steep and quick side, but the mango water they served us was delicious. Also a beautiful and calming location.
Wonderful food and service! Highly recommend!
Ok, how can it get any better? Hanging out in a Suite, free beer, food and of course a Suns win, didn't look that way early in the game but the Suns came thru in the 2nd half of the game. Go Suns!
Room was big and standard. Not many towels but enough. No refrigerator. The food was meh, and drinks expensive. Girls were alright, the casino didn't smell too bad.
Charged us $75 for water. I guess we have to ask for tap water? Do they offer tap water? This place is ridiculous. I guess I'm not a French restaurant kinda girl.
Love it. Huge! But the layout is confusing... We found parking without circling, 5 spots down the street. We had a great time but did not find the hat that I was looking for.
two stars based solely on the bar and happy hour. Service sucked and happy hour prices don't make me happy
Love the Food! Love Pat! Love Freddy! If you love clams, calamari, shrimp, scallops and mussels -- you'll love the Linguine Portofino!
It's good , but I don't think it's the best. I would go back to eat here.
Nice place that has a hipster vibe without being pretentious. Good coffee and pastries.
Great service and very friendly. Oil change didn't take long and they gave me a discount. Def going here for my car again.
Cool for sure, great design and staff. The dishes are great however the quality of product is meh. I like being there, i just feel ripped eating there:/
I finally found a bar in my neighborhood with a patio for smokers and now they are closed. RIP
Sumits yoga is addicting. You feel so great after these hour and 15 minute classes. My favorite teacher is Jordan--he rocks.
decent donuts but horrible coffee....
Everything is ALWAYS on point! I never leave here disappointed. They have amazing service that's super speedy. The food is absolutely delicious.
Great food! Great ambience! One of my favorite places to eat in Vegas! Make sure to check out the club after dinner!
Very good sandwiches bagels and desserts Will be back.
Absolutely no customer service! Four people standing around and only one teller. Manager needs some training
Great staff, very attentive Clean and organized.
I used to really like this place but it seems the quality has dropped off. I picked up a to go order today and it reminded me why I had not eaten their food in almost a year.
Okay store, they don't offer double coupons, only at face value. Only come here for eggs and milks. Surprise that they are still in business!
Good food. And the waitress leaves you alone...until you need a refill on drinks.
My favorite place to get my BBW. Customer service here is great,they are very perky and attentive here. love it!
I realize this is a chain, but the food is tasty and different for the usual chain fare. A real value
I love this place! food was great and the service was good. Pizookie is aaamazing! def a good date night place, or even just to hang out with friends!
I ordered double pepperoni and double cheese. Good thing, otherwise I wouldn't have been able to call it pizza.
Very noisy with limited menu. Good appetizers, love the Zucca chips.
Awesome. Awesome. Awesome. And I don't even like thai food.
I had an item taken from our room. When we expressed our concern we never even received a phone call back.
Great fish & chips... Very very pricey for what u get! Unless you go on friday... but the Halibut is crazy expensive... One piece for 11 bucks... ??? Yeah....

The steak was burnt on the edges, the salad lacked freshness and the baked potatoe was a little salty. The service wasn't too bad.
Good service; friendly staff; great selection and fresh ingredients. Clean. Doesn't get any better than this!
Bottom of the barrel. I would not even eat here if the KGB escorted me here by gunpoint.
Good atmosphere with great food! The stuffed French toast was delicious! Omelette was good with lots to choose from.
Great ambiance, very good menu which caters to everyone's needs. Whether you are a meat eater or vegan there is something there for you. Expensive but worth it.
What a nice venue for a concert, we have been here several times for other events and had a great time.
I've eaten here twice and both times it was a disapointment, I'd be a fool to come back a third time.
Great location but not the best decor. Under renovation now so it may be better in a year.
After being ignored down the street by Arribas Mexican grill, we enjoyed the spicy grilled catfish and the chicken fried steak, it was delicious!
I went to eat there yesterday, it was bad!,,, food is dry, it is not worth it for the price, I remember 3years ago this was a great place to eat. I would say not good...
Eh... the kinda place that doesn't seem to change very often. Good to go once to poke around but not the kinda place that you'd go every Sunday to look for deals!
Used to be a great dive to shoot pool/darts. Now over priced and boring. Might as well be a Starbucks
Good place to eat or get a beer for happy hour. They have many classic Irish dishes, burgers, and sandwiches. Sweet potato fries are quite tasty. Nice location right on Mill Avenue with patio.

I went on a Wednesday and sat at the bar.

Food was ok, wine was priced right, service ok.

Pretty solid place to hang out if you don't have high food expectations.

Great terrace.
Nothing special, move along
Has some nice water works but since they are building large buildings all around it, it feels more like a cement prison rather than anything else. Nice tulips.
Great place. Huge portions and very interesting food! Saw this on Man v. Food so I knew that I had to try it. What I got I didn't really like but what everybody else was eating looked amazing!
Big slice for $5. The pepperoni was good- lots of flavor, wide, flat slices. The crust was thin and crisp. I would've preferred more sauce but I enjoyed this pizza
Do not fix your I phone here. They use cheap parts and everytime you get something done here another part fails shortly after. Not worth all the trouble.
You know the buffet is bad when the best option is to make a ham sandwich and you still can't eat it.

Not my favorite. Teriaki Madness is much better
K they redeemed themselves. After wanting 23 min past my resv, svc was excellent. Food great and it's a lot. Did the 140 per person, choice 2 steaks , appetizer , salad, sides, and dessert OMG

just waited 45 minutes no service saw 4 groups that arrived after us get seated just left
Just a big cluster f@!#, over priced in everything, the concert venue SUCKS, the location, the rules and once again pricing. \nJust not a pleasant experience.
Found a piece of thick human HAIR in my egg rolls! Gross! Pork bun was raw... Not fully cooked . Don't waste your $ here. So gross . This place is unsanitary ! You will get sick.
Things come and go in Vegas, but this one is consistently good. Lovely ambiance. Really great food.
Finally found a real barber shop. Great cut, chill spot and reasonably priced. Alejandro definitely hooked it up.
yuck. had to send a piece of sushi back because of a bug and should've known then to stop eating. tummy didn't feel so good the rest of the night.

A tad pricy, average portions, but it's the best chinese food I've had in the states of Pennsylvania and Michigan
Ate there twice and I wasn't impressed. My wife ordered the Blackbean burger and it was dry and tasteless! I got the Mushroom Swiss and I'd rate it as \'ok\'; I was expecting more...for the price.
Not even close to Korean food. Just because they have Koreans working does not mean its authentic food. Not enough side dishes. Food was ok. But I guess for Montreal it's fine
This was a terrible experience. Slowwwwwwwwe service and zero interest from the wait staff in being helpful. There was not enough good meats ever. Really subpar are every front
It has been a year since my visit so I will say you should check the place out for yourself.\n\nGood Luck with the business JK.
Had the ropa vieja. Very good. Rice and beans good but not remarkable.\n\nHad the cuban sandwich. Very good, just as good as leftovers.
It was ok but the sauce did not agree with my stomach. Would try something different next time

Went here on a double date. I would say that everything was \'good\'. I found it to be a little over priced. Nothing wrong- nothing great.
Big, clean store, but nothing in it! Where's all the merchandise and how does this place stay open with seemingly nothing to sell? I prefer Marshalls.
Good Thai food, they will make it proper \'Thai hot\' if you ask them, not that watered down crud. You might have to convince them you mean it though.
Seems like a good crowd. Very chill. Cool signs, but the atmosphere is lacking.
Limited selections, not much favors in the foods. Service was slow and not as friendly.

We needed something like this in the Fitchburg area! I love the daily specials - esp ladies night! All around fun place to hang out.
What a great place if you have the time to wait it well worth it. Top 10 pizza places I have ate anywhere. A hole pie takes about 30 min so get a pice of siclan!!!!!!
Food is good. Service is odd. This place is way overstaffed but service is hard to come by.

* Go to IN & OUT BURGER *

Nothing said WOW to me. Tasty but the roll broke apart like cheap wonderbread and a little overpriced. 

I won't be back, sorry Mr Fatburger
Pharmacy is entirely too slow. This is a busy place. Either need faster workers or more of them
I love going to Target. This store is laid out real funny. Dont like that very much. But every employee that I have encountered here has been very helpful.

Oh my word, thank YOU Scottsdale.

Heaven in a slice of meat & potatah! Yes, I said 'potatah!' 

YUMM. Freakin' yumm... Good 'ol meat and potatoes.

Great golf carts, nice grounds, medium difficulty, small bar area but nice.
Overpriced for the quality and quantity. It simply does not live up to Vegas standards. I was very disappointed. I do not mind paying for good sushi, but this one was below average.
Food was ok \n\nWaiter forgot my water but the biggest sin was the shut off the baseball game I asked them to put on in the Bottom of the 9th...some sports bar
Great place to go! Good food, friendly staff...a bit pricy but it's worth it once in a while... pourquoi pas?\n\nDesserts are the best!
It's loud, trendy, outside, it was ok
The food and service are not good. We've tried 3 different times and it's just bad. It's unfortunate, it would be awesome to have good Mexican in the neighborhood but this isn't it.
Great place to go to especially on the weekends, Thursdays, Fridays, and Saturdays. Line can be long, but if you know people, you can pretty much just get in before other people.
Very good Mediterranean fare. Very flavorful and authentic. A small family run spot that clearly cares about quality. Worth a stop.
Just opened and their service is dialed in. Great, fun atmosphere. Food was really good. Portions were big. It's obvious the employees love working there. Keep up the good work!
Great folks, nice trail ride thru Papago Park and a throw back to the old Wyoming ranch in the big city.
Good southern country cooking , great prices nice sized portions I had grilled salmon , collard greens, coconut pie delicious .\n.
Nom

Not authentic. But again, this is not New York....
Fabulous healthy food! I love their cheesecakes! Smoothies are awesome! Staff is very friendly! I wish they were located closer too me, so I could eat there more than once a week:)

Had a really good time here. The staff were friendly and the steak was good. Only thing stopping this from being a 5 is the slight conveyor belt feel of the large Las Vegas restaurants.
The bar is very friendly and service was great. Free chips and salsa is a bonus too. Different types of salsa's to sample too. Wings were fair.
Yakitori is really good here, the miso is soso, and the rest looked good, but i don't like sushi..the staff is really nice and all in all a fun place.
Typical fremont casino. Liked bennys bull pen and still want to try the steakhouse. My bf likes to gamble here.
Worst zoo I've ever been too. Way over priced for a filthy facility. Will never waste my money here again. The only nice thing I can say is that all of the staff are very friendly

This place was amazing! And the selection was fantastic :)
The salsa was okay. The fajitas, nothing to write home about. Overall, for a place that always has a long line....the food was not very good.
Great food and atmosphere if you can get past then incredibly rude hostess. Their brunch is a better option than their dinner.
I like running in here for a quickie lunch with their slice and drink special.
Food was just ok. Service was unremarkable. Drinks were good. Food portions were very small. Rather pricey.
If you like racist waiters, inattentive servers, over cooked meat and limited options then this is the place for you. Worst Brazilian Steakhouse I've ever visited. But the salad bar was nice.
Awesome Hotel, Mediocre Casino.
Wanted to love it, but don't. Don't understand the hype. Didn't even finish my ribs. The definition of \'meh\' for me.

Tried the shrimp fried rice. I think it's safe to say I'm never going back.

Gro\u00dfe Auswahl an Cocktails in einer aparten Atmosph\u00e4re, die sich dezent von der Masse abhebt. Zu den Cocktails gibt es Gurkenwasser und ein bisschen Knabberzeug. Reservierung empfehlenswert.
The most delicious freshes. Chinese food on the east side. Whenever I am in this area I already know what I am gonna eat :)

Second visit Great patio but so many damn flies- and it's been like that for months- seriously need a fly trap- in my beer, food, all over the tables- disgusting.

Best hot chocolate ever, I highly recommend this place as the food is very good as well!
This is my SPOT! I come here for the Asada Fries, Taquitos or the Tacos..
good food, decent prices, fun atmosphere. it can be crowded! for pure sports event viewing, it would be better with all flat-screen HD sets, but you can't have everything I suppose.
I am thankful every day for you and your team Michael Barnes! You guys are awesome and I will recommend you to anyone that will listen! :)
Completely lame.
+ good variety of sauces and wing styles\n+ Not the best wings in town, but pretty good overall. If you're in the Santa Fe and you're looking for something to eat, this is one of the better options.
The bread is awesome. Light on the meat, and the veggies weren't the freshest. Will go back only with a coupon as its costly for a sandwich.
Okay spot for lunch. The salads are pretty good. A little pricey for what you get. I wouldn't drive here to eat lunch, but if you work within walking distance it is a reasonable alternative.

We didn't even get to eat! The hostess skipped over us and made us wait over an hour before we left.
Great dumplings! Cheap too!

go here. good beer.
It used to be good. But recently the quality plummeted badly. I don't wanna eat here again! Tasteless wings. Bad servers. Nothing is good about this place now!
Good food. Decent price. The server could have been more attentive to our needs.
I really had high hope for the Groupon for 2 for 1 gel or shellac manicure. Let's just say I won't be returning.
The best mexican food in casa grande. Really good prices. I've tried their nachos, carne asada burritos, and menudo, all are excellent. They have a nice salsa bar as well.

Meh.. Edemame toooo salty. Ordered small asaragus roll.. Didn't show up. Entre was okay nothing spectacular. Prob won't be back.

Place is a cute little beer bar! Great beer selection too. Our server megan was really nice and helpful! We had the hummus and the pretzel pizzas and they were both really tasty!
Interesting crowd, good decor and Law and Order on the overhead TV on a Friday night?

Sitting at new opening. Upsell attempts on even chips and guacamole.. lol. Menu somewhat limited. Tapas style.. Seems loaded with expensive tacos. Food was average. Had nachos and Baja fish.

I had a great experience here, Emanuel is a very good service advisor. Thank you Findlay for your great customer service!
$600 for the 4 of us and I can't wait for the show to end so we could leave. Don't waste your money!!
Lady at the dressing room gave a lot of attitude, when i talk to my little sister about what she is allowed and not allowed to wear, input was un necessary, please.
Great shop, been coming here for years. I don't trust any other shop in Vegas. Definitely recommend making an appointment before you come.
Grab a coffee, and window shop. People watch. Sip. Enjoy.
Michelle has been my waxer since 2006 I will not go to anyone else in Phoenix unless she decides to move. Love the atmosphere she creates for you! She is great!

Horrible service and food..and they ran out of beans and tortilla.and your a mexican restaurant.
Limited dim sum selection. Slow and inattentive service. Skip it and go somewhere else.
Great food\nOnly one problem\nI don't like is that they put the silverware in a tin in the center of the tables. People cough, and talk over it which makes it not sanitary.
Not a treasure at treasure island! Just\nNot impressed compared to other casinos. This review is based strictly on the casino. More of a smoke smell\nThan other casinos.
This place is pretty cool. Love the decor and the staff is very friendly. I did get sick after eating here the first time. lol But I am willing to give it another try!
solid four and a half. Good food, great service. The crab was super fresh and I likes the offerings and desert. I would have this as my top seven buffets in Vegas!
Super yummy! The crust is thin enough to not make you feel like you ate too much. Everything looks fresh, and of quality. & it's very inexpensive. Definitely found our new pizza spot!!! Yay!
The food was pretty decent, but the waitresses were inattentive. No ambiance. Good green tea. They tried to commit our order to memory, which was a colossal failure. Both orders were slightly wrong.
Disgusting. I don't like it. A lot of crazy people, very dirty. Homeless people. We took bus here, it took more than 1 hour because of traffic. The big screen was nothing special.

Service was mediocre food nothing to rave about only thing Bread was excellent
Seafood chowder was delicious... Lots of meat in it! Loved the steamed clams. Not crowded, will come again if in town :)
This place is great despite the bad reviews. Dollar tacos and 2 dollar burritos Monday Tuesday and Wednesday. Can't beat that.
Our breakfast this past weekend, not so good. super crowded and order was not correct.
Dry chicken, bland help, yay it's southpark.
Loved the pulled pork sandwich!! This is a terrific family owned, neighborhood BBQ shop! I could eat there every day of the week!!
The best grilled chicken and ribs in town. Favorite sides are the chicken pasta salad and steamed veggies. YUM!!!
Pretty darn good overall. The garlic bread was AMAZING. The pasta was better than average. The decor was nice and comfortable. Looking forward to coming back soon.
RIG was awesome. Great live music, great crowd and my favorite Irish ale. What else can a guy ask for. Just a good ole party bar with the neighborhood crowd.

Needs a remodel. Plain and simple. No 24hr coffee shop. You can stop with the \'we luv locals\' crap. The M shows a lot more \'luv\' in every way.
FANTASTIC! !! Wonderful family and they have great food TOO!!! Everything is amazing, you really can't go wrong, they even make tamales.
Its just ok. They didn't return any of my phone calls. The people that work there are definitely not friendly. very small space. The teachers are very good.
Worst service ever! brought the burger no fries...didn't care. Sent back the entire meal and no manager. waiter didnt even offer to bring me a new meal. Will go to McDonalds or In n Out next time.
I absolutely love pho so 1. Delicious authentic Vietnamese food. The staff is great. I've been a customer for 7yrs.
I'm not sure if I lived at the same place as these last two reviews. This place is tacky. Plan on being charged for carpet when you leave if you have pets.

Bad service at this location

Its just Ok. Very slow service. Pizza was not bad but nothing spectacular. I do not know what else to say. I was hungry, i ate some of their pizza, it was not too bad, i became unhungry. End of story.

Long long long lines and employees are helpful but dont seem very happy. It must be all the older people from sun city who I see fighting with them.

Super-helpful sales people, great service, but can sometimes offer a limited selection. Great place to go if you can be flexible with what you're looking for!
Amazing customer service. Very clean. Their buffet is good and is in the vegas top ten list of good buffets. Idk i just love this place

Save time,don't go, very rude and not very knowledgeable at all. Really don't know how their in business.

Very fast, painless, friendly, professional. What more could you want?! I'll be back soon!

AMAZING sandwiches. I tried three different sandwiches and each one was more delicious than the last. Definitely would recommend to anyone looking for a quick bite in the area.
Crap place that screwed up my rims on my brand new Jetta last year and would not take responsibility for it. Will not go back!
this business is now closed
Great Salon the staff was great along with the price! Recommend it everyone..

the place where all you gotta have is a record to work there!!!sweet!!!

Convenient, fast, and a good cut.
Unbelievable grilled cheese sandwiches!! The best you will ever experience. OMG

This place was good probably my 3rd favorite ever. Really enjoyed the steak and appetizers

great yellow curry and Thai tea here. think this the BEST chicken Satay I have ever had, but its made the traditional way so be prepared to wait awhile for it . well worth it

WOW! That is all

nice view, good service

reat food and smoothies! Portions were just enough.G

close the door.

Decent

 Not much to write about, so I'm done.

Dirty in the winter, understandable, don't like when I get a red eye and I have to put my own coffee in
It was alright.. I've had better pizza elsewhere. The staff seemed too bust to \'deal with me\', but hey, maybe I just went on a busy night.
I really liked the massaman curry here but then the food poisoning.... errrr not so much.\n\nGreat service though!
Water is great!! Perfectly cooled and nicely filtered. The fish on the other hand was dry and way over seasoned. And they don't have a option to order double meat made me pay for another meal.
The crowd is expected but the workers and and their rudeness is not cool
The bathrooms were REALLY dirty, I couldn't find anyone to help me, and I waited at the cash register for some time before the cashier hung up his \'personal\' phone call to wait on me.
Large portions, great service, great place to get dressed up & share a date night with your loved one.
Great service. Good food. Had baked scallops. Reasonable prices
Always good food here. But servers are not really friendly and no smile! But the bus persons are really nice and helpful, so tip the bus and forget the servers!
Just an egg and cheese breakfast burrito, came with random grills scraps. Just nasty. Egg tasted like it was cooked with engine oil.
I just had it for lunch: for about $20 I got a seaweed salad ( somewhat tasteless), and sushi from all day HH menu: spicy scallop( quite disgusting) and Caterpillar ( liked it). \nNah, wont come back
I went here with my girlfriend a few times. Seems fine. I don't have a membership at any gym so I can't compare but I can't say anything bad about it.
Great place to eat and watch the games. And this is at a great location. Great service.
I always get great service and find deals at Sunflower. Great place to shop!!
Foods pretty good, never had dim sum so I can't complain about anything :)
Best dive in Vegas. Great service. Gaming. Live music. Best jukebox.
A RC wedged into a corporate park with great veiws of the parking deck. Below average service and food. The strip steak was fatty and seemed to be boiled in butter. Yuck. The wine was red and delish.
We ordered a mixed plate and saimin. Portions are pretty generous. Will come back again.
Simply put, this place is fantastic. A rare find in an area of dirty restaurants with sub par food! Kenny is the best. As long as it is veggie, he will make it for you.
Love this place! The train is awesome! Feeding the ducks is fun! Great play ground area! The merry-go-round is fun! Great place to take your little ones!
Great place to dine before going to a show downtown. Service was excellent with Kathleen. Food was terrific and the martinis to die for.
Burgers were good. It's Vegas so the price isn't cheap. I would eat here again. I was shocked it was that good. Service was good. It cost about $10 less the BurGR. My burger was perfect. wasnt burnt.
Smoothies are great but waiting 25min in a drive thru is crazy...no excuse for this long of waiting for smoothies, sandwiches, and salads. Seems like they are way understaffed all the time.
Just like all the other ones. Fast service, good food and no complaints. Very clean.
the food was delicious!!! drove all the way from casa grande just to eat here!! service was great !!! our waitress was prompt and met all our food needs !! will definitely come back !!!
I went to eat here and discovered a roach in my chicken wings. They offered a $40 gift card but I do not feel great about eating there again.
Sandra is awesome. Thorough but very gentle when waxing \'delicate areas\'. I also started getting her pumpkin facials which are awesome. She takes good care of my skin, head to toe ;-)
Food is okay, nothing to write home about, servers seem like their mad at the world! Sitting outside on a warm day in the shade, good environment
Bad service! The malted waffle for $5.00 looked and tasted like a toaster waffle. We went here because the rating was good but.........
I love a breakfast place that has healthy options and free pie :-)

Such a delicious spot for brunch! The prices are reasonable and the wait didn't take too long. I can't wait to go back and try other specialties! \n\n*They only seat you if your whole party is present
Although is very americanized chinese food, the taste is pretty good for the cheap price. Esp lunch, 5 bucks can get you lots of food.\n \nBetter for take out, not a lot of seating area.

Great place !!
Nice environment. Good food, good bears and good service.
Had dinner one night and come back next night!
Coconut shrimps are so good !!!
Been here twice. 99 cent margaritas are standard and what you'd expect. Food is also standard. Price is right for the food.
The food was well-made and I do enjoy a great spicy kick, but the curry may have overpowered the dish. I may have to give it another shot but perhaps Laotian food is just not for me.
It was fine. The food was OK but I've certainly had better and fresher Thai food elsewhere. I would not go back.
Excellent customer service, excellent food, and excellent atmosphere. I would recommend this place to anyone. Loved it!!! Very good prices for what you get.
A very ocnfusing casino layout, but isn't that their goal? Some pits were very warm while others were very cold. Off the beaten path but worth a visit to see the casino and shops.
This place is the real deal. I tried a local Greek chain. My big fat and Z's smokes them all. Try it and see what good fresh Greek is all about.
Pretty good craft your own then weigh it froyo joint
Got the Thai Curry Chicken...horrible. The chicken was weird...it was very thinly sliced and rubbery??? And def not Thai curry.
This was a no frills cheap buffet, with surprisingly decent food and quality. You wont find anything special here but it was better than eating in the food court. Prices are pretty low as well.
Come by a few times and haven't been disappointed. Beer, pretzel and burger.....what more can you ask for.
Excellent food. Great prices. The only place on the west coast with properly prepared bagels. Friendly and polite staff.
I like to check out the after holiday deals. Sometimes you find a winner. pricing isn't any better than the other guys
Good food, good service. No complaints.
Had to call twice and sit on hold for 10 minutes for them to rudely tell me they don't have the item in stock. I will never visit this location based on that call.
Reserved a non-smoking room and they could not accommodate when I checked in. I will never come back.
Best tacos in Phoenix! No other taco place in Phoenix comes even close to the great tacos they serve here. The wait is long but well worth it. If you want the best tacos, then this is the spot.
I ordered the carna asada fries, tastes horrible, & ended up throwing it all away. No discounts for the military. Your better off going to viva el taco, free drink with your order.
